title: Earthquake tremors felt in Turbat, Quetta
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP):Earthquake tremors were felt on Wednesday in the Turbat city of Balochistan.
According to the seismological center, the earthquake had a magnitude of 4.2 and a depth of 35 km, reported a private news channel.
The epicenter was located 24 km away from Turbat in the north-west.
However, no loss of life or damage to property has been reported from any part of Turbat and surrounding areas so far.
